titleStmt.title: England's shame, or, The unmasking of a politick atheist being a full and faithful relation of the life and death of that grand impostor, Hugh Peters : wherein is set forth his whole comportment, policies, and principles, exercised from the ingress, in the progress, and to the egress of his unhappy life / by William Yonge ...
titleStmt.author: Yonge, William, d. 1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Da. Maxwel for Theodore Sadler ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: portrait of Peters lacking in filmed copy.
